page.title: 01OVERVIEW OF LITTLEMILL AREA
page.content: The{school}sits in a{rural area} surrounded by farm land. The{school}is {not}in the{local village}but sits at the bottom of the hill which is the only road into the village and all traffic has to go up. There is very little in the way of amenities in the area and we have to travel to Drongan or one of the other larger towns which are all a bus ride away. The scenery around the area is beautiful as the mining industry has long since closed down and the countryside has begun the process of covering the scars left when the coal was being mined. The majority of the working adults have to travel out of the area to find work as this was mainly a mining community and the number now employed in that industry has dropped to almost none.
